posts.post_content: I really want to sell these two cards together.  I am willing to take a loss if necessary to sell the cards.  I guess I overpaid for some of them.  I am lowering the price of both cards to $180 delivered (Foley White (OLD MILL) SGC 40 and Frank King Piedmont SGC 30).  Please consider...or make any other offers...working hard to sell these cards.  I can be reached at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url].

Oops...realize I also have Bill Hart - SL - OLD MILL - SGC 30...willing to hear offers to include that card in as well.

PS-  sorry for the multiple postings...computer glitch.  I can't figure out how to delete the other posting...guess I'm lacking computer skills...

Is there any way you could please try to just update the original thread instead of making lots of new ones?  You can edit old posts for information like "XXXX card now sold", or add new posts to the existing thread to bump it to the top for information like "YYYY card has now been added".
My computer put through three of the same posts.  I tried to delete two of them but couldn't.  I apologize.
